sourcesContent:
import { createStore, combineReducers, applyMiddleware } from 'redux'
import thunk from 'redux-thunk'
import { composeWithDevTools } from 'redux-devtools-extension'
import { productListReducer, productDetailsReducer } from './reducers/productReducers'
import { cartReducer} from './reducers/cartReducers'
import { userLoginReducer, userRegisterReducer, userDetailsReducer, userUpdateProfileReducer } from './reducers/userReducers'
import {orderCreateReducer,orderDeliverReducer,orderDetailsReducer,orderListMyReducer} from './reducers/orderReducers'
const reducer = combineReducers({
	productList: productListReducer,
	productDetails: productDetailsReducer,
	cart: cartReducer,
	userLogin: userLoginReducer,
	userRegister: userRegisterReducer,
	userDetails: userDetailsReducer,
	userUpdateProfile: userUpdateProfileReducer,
	orderCreate: orderCreateReducer,
	orderDetails: orderDetailsReducer,
	orderPay: orderPayReducer,
	orderDeliver: orderDeliverReducer,
	orderListMy: orderListMyReducer,
	orderList: orderListReducer,

})

const cartItemsFromStorage = localStorage.getItem('cartItems') ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cartItems')) : []
const loginFromStorage = localStorage.getItem('userInfo') ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('userInfo')) : null
const shippingAddressFromStorage = localStorage.getItem('shippingAddress') ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('shippingAddress')) : {}

const initialState = {
	cart: { cartItems: cartItemsFromStorage,
		shippingAddress: shippingAddressFromStorage },
	userLogin: { userInfo: loginFromStorage },
	
}

const middleware = [thunk]
const store = createStore(reducer, initialState, composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(...middleware)))

export default store
